MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH3 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:29pm. Our engineers have arrived at the Royal Crescent substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:52pm on Monday, 22 March 2021
